Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ……イーフォンに選ばれた時、 何か、特別な事をした覚えはない？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey... Do you remember doing anything in particular when you were chosen by Eephon?

Entry.JapaneseText: い、いや……ムカついたから、 言い返してやったけど……それがどうした？
Entry.EnglishText: N-not really... I did talk back to him because I was pissed off, but... Why do you ask?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ううん、聖獣に選ばれるには どうしたらいいのか、考えてただけ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, I was wondering what I would need to do to be chosen by a Sacred Beast...
